t:
“Stop! Thief”, I shouted as the man snatched my bag and ran.


‘Oh, wait’, I thought, as I saw him running into the crowd.

‘He's made my work easier. Now I just need to press the button and he'll do my work for me.’
c:
How surprised they'll be when I return alive to the headquarters.



#terrorist #suicidebomber #kill #people #crowd #remotecontrol #thief #badluck





***SPOILER***

Explanation: There's a bomb in the bag. Check the hashtags too.
